Docs.summary: Creates a new N3 parser for a stream.

Docs.param: The name of a file, or "-" to read from Console.In.
Docs.summary: Creates a new N3 parser for the given file.
Reads RDF statements from a Notation 3 (N3, Turtle, or NTriples) stream.

remarks.para: Most of the N3 specification is supported, including everything in NTriples and Turtle. Statements are streamed as soon as they are read from the stream.

N3 formula notation with { and } is supported in the following way. For every formula, an anonymous entity is created to represent that graph. Every statement in the formula is imported with the property set to the anonymous entity (unless it is recursively embedded in another formula, in which case it uses the innermost formula's anonymous entity).
